contextId.occurrenceNote: The abstract noun "grace" can be translated as the verb "be kind." Alternate translation: "understood that God had been kind to me" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: γνόντες τὴν χάριν τὴν δοθεῖσάν μοι
contextId.glQuote: understood the grace that had been given to me

contextId.occurrenceNote: "those who have faith." The meaning of the noun "faith" can be expressed with the verb "believe." Alternate translation: "those who believe" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])
